# PED::IS_SYNCHRONIZED_SCENE_HOLD_LAST_FRAME

## Summary
Returns true if the specified scene is set to hold last frame

## Parameters
* **INT** sceneID: The scene index returned by CREATE_SYNCHRONIZED_SCENE

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns true is the specified scene is set to hold last frame
